title: 'TruthBrush' knows when your technique needs a check-up
text:
'TruthBrush' knows when your technique needs a check-up 2:04pm BST - 01:49 
The humble manual toothbrush has been turned into a sensor-packed monitoring tool to help developers design the 'perfect' toothbrush. Matthew Stock reports.   
The humble manual toothbrush has been turned into a sensor-packed monitoring tool to help developers design the 'perfect' toothbrush. Matthew Stock reports.  //reut.rs/2q16qSr
